title: Unpatching and Repatching
body: I have a problem with the new client, it keeps un patching and re patching consistently, it has done so over 20 times within the last 20 hours and it's extremely annoying. Anyone have a solution?

replies.body: Where do you have League installed? I often see this behavior if League is either *heavily corrupted* or if League has been installed or simply launched from a temporary folder.
